p: When analyzing IFN-γ production by NP 147-, HA 518- and HA 462-specific T CD8 on a per-cell basis, we found comparable geometric mean fluorescence intensity (gMFI) values in PBS- and SEB-pretreated animals. To be exact, the mean gMFI ± SEM of IFN-γ staining in PBS- and SEB-pretreated mice (n = 23 per group) was 3,341 ± 373 vs. 3,624 ± 347 (NP 147), 2,207 ± 277 vs. 2,163 ± 298 (HA 518), and 1,529 ± 210 vs. 1,716 ± 240 (HA 462), respectively. Therefore, SEB had simply expanded the above-indicated IAV-specific T CD8 clones without tampering with their ability to produce IFN-γ.
